main.get2know_message: Our goal is to eliminate the hassle of localization by providing tools to automate, integrate and better manage your translations. Lokalise is a better way for growth-oriented companies to expand their mobile apps, games, software or digital content into multiple languages.
main.long-key_multiple-paras:
